description: With a grin that never quite left that oh so cute face, Pete is the a good 'ole county boy who grew into one fine strapping, hung and horny serving man folk. That smile was Colgate white, went from ear to ear and seemed to keep a spot light shining on that handsome face and casting a glow on that lean, sexy, marble smooth, body!He sure sounds like every inch the Southern gentleman with that cute little twang of is and though the charm doesn't ever wear off, fortunately his clothes do and before those boxers go down, that dick is already up and the South is rising again....almost nine full inches of it and as thick a serving of meat as we have ever seen.Seeing him begin with such a gentle, polite clean cut exterior one minute to naked hell cat working that long, extra-thick slab of meat the next was almost as hot hearing him moan, flex those pecs, tighten those abs and serve up a load of special homemade country gravy that covered a whole platter of biscuits! Come and get boys...dinner is served!
title: Southern Comfort
